amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that allows airports to increase passenger facility charges.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 4 and printed in H. Rept. 106-185 to strike sec. 105 that authorizes an increase in Passenger Facility Charges.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graham amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 245 (Roll no. 208).

action.text: On agreeing to the Graham amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: (Roll No. 208).
